decks.notes: The main idea of this deck is to quickly overwhelm your opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. By playing efficient low-cost creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Cori-Steel Cutter, combined with spells like Burst Lightning and Monstrous Rage, you can deal damage quickly and efficiently. Opt and Sleight of Hand help you dig for more threats or answers, while cards like Slickshot Show-Off and Stormchaser's Talent provide added value and board presence. The mana base allows for consistent casting of both creatures and spells, ensuring a fast and furious playstyle.

This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on using a combination of disruptive spells and aggressive creatures to control the board and deal damage quickly to the opponent. By utilizing removal spells like Go for the Throat and Cut Down to get rid of opposing threats, while playing efficient creatures like Spyglass Siren and Floodpits Drowner to apply pressure, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure a victory by efficiently managing resources and maintaining tempo. Additionally, the deck includes cards like Anoint with Affliction and Restless Reef to provide additional card advantage and resilience.

This deck focuses on playing aggressive creatures with powerful abilities to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing spells like Torch the Tower and Spell Pierce to control the board and protect your creatures, you can push through damage and secure victory. The mix of creatures with various abilities, such as Fear of Missing Out and Marauding Mako, along with card draw from Profit's Eidetic Memory, allows for a versatile and potent strategy. Jeskai Aggro seeks to maintain pressure and tempo throughout the game to assert dominance and secure a swift victory.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive Orzhov creature cards and disruption spells, constantly applying pressure and controlling the board. By playing efficient creatures like Sunpearl Kirin and Preacher of the Schism, supported by disruption spells like Nowhere to Run and Temporary Lockdown, the deck aims to establish a dominant board presence while disrupting the opponent's strategy. The deck also includes cards like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse for extra power and resilience in the late game, ensuring that the Orzhov Aggro strategy remains strong throughout the match.
